Magazine as a birdhouse: Fold the magazine into a birdhouse shape and hang it outside.
Magazine as a phone stand: Roll up the magazine and use it as a phone stand for your phone or tablet.
Magazine as a bookmark: Use the pages of the magazine as bookmarks in your books or notebooks.
Magazine as a weather: Use the pages of the magazine to create a DIY weather by covering a piece of cardboard with the pages and taping it to a wall.
Magazine as a picture frame: Cut out the pictures from the magazine and use them as frames for your own photos.
